title: keeps logging out
body: so i went into my 10th placement game with no issues till it wouldnt load me into the game. i was on call with my duo partner and it said he couldnt do a remake because i was in game. so i tried to log in again and it let me in. for 5 seconds. now it just keeps logging me out. my internet connection is perfect. this is miserable.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like something might be going on preventing your network from keeping a solid link with our servers if you keep getting disconnected from that match. Be sure to stay away from ranked/normals and do this troubleshooting in custom/practice until we're sure you'll be able to reliably get into those matches!

I'd like you to fire [**troubleshooting your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) really quickly to make sure those aren't getting in the way first. If that doesn't help, grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post the results here so I can take a look.
